GSD.description:
xen/netfront: fix leaking data in shared pages

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.129 by commit 728d68bfe68d92eae1407b8a9edc7817d6227404. For more details please see the references link.
